## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G12145](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G12145)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>FLR1, FTM4</u>
- **Gene Name:** FLOR1, FLORAL TRANSITION AT THE MERISTEM4
- **Description:**   Leucine-rich repeat (LRR) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2082274
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
